name: Barcode Media Group
tag_list: barcode, qrcode, rfid, pointofsale, pos, publishing
overview:
The Go-to website for everything barcode.

About Barcode.com / The Bar Code News

It is our objective to provide an informative and useful website pertaining to the bar code and auto-id industry. We provide a variety of news, advice, opinion, reference material and barcoding tools. We also discuss QRcodes, and RFID.

The penetration of bar code technology in the business and consumer world continues to increase. With the increasingly rapid adoption of bar code scanning on mobile phones the industry is adding tens of millions of new users per year. While a bar code itself is a relatively unobtrusive item, the number of applications for users continues to grow substantially. We believe this is an exciting place to be!

The company also publishes The Point of Sale News, a publication dedicated to retail point of sale technology, including hardware, software, payment processing, loyalty programs, digital signage and more. www.pointofsale.com
